scripts.dev: npm i && npm run seed && npm run build && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.builder: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.render-build: npm install && npm run clean:all && npm run install && npm run build
scripts.render-build:lambda: cd server && npm install && npm run build:lambda
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
